sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: I met a prince, Fairy Godmother.
sentences.chinese: 我遇到了一個王子，精靈教母。

sentences.english: Even today, god parents will often give shoes to their godchild on this occasion.
sentences.chinese: 即使是今天，教父教母給教子的禮物仍常常是鞋。

sentences.english: Diana was the godmother of Mrs Moncktons daughter Domenica.
sentences.chinese: 戴安娜還是蒙克頓夫人的女兒多梅尼卡的教母。

sentences.english: Cinderella was broken-hearted. At that time, her fairy godmother appeared.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘非常地傷心，這時，教母出現了。

sentences.english: "All good things go in threes," said she, "I am asked to stand godmother again.
sentences.chinese: “好事成三嘛，”它說，“又有人請我去當教母了。

sentences.english: I had a godmother who made herself responsible in this way for me.
sentences.chinese: 我也有一個這種肩負神聖職責的教母。

sentences.english: Cinderella was broken-hearted. Atthat time, her fairy godmother appeared.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘非常地傷心，這時，教母出現了。

sentences.english: All good things go in threes, said she, I am asked to stand godmother again.
sentences.chinese: “好事成三嘛，”它說，“又有人請我去當教母了。

definition: lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
